structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts

law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 17. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] If a commissioner appointed under section two dies or resigns before his duties are fully performed, or, if for unreasonable neglect to make the return required by law or for any other cause, is removed, the probate court may fill the vacancy.
